title.rendered: Westamerica Bancorporation Declares Quarterly Dividend and Announces Stock Repurchase Plan

content.rendered:
For Immediate Release

San Rafael, CA: Westamerica Bancorporation (NASDAQ: WABC) today declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.39 per share on common stock outstanding to shareholders of record at the close of business August 7, 2017. The dividend is payable August 18, 2017.

Westamerica Bancorporation’s Board of Directors also approved a plan to repurchase, as conditions warrant, up to 1,750,000 shares of the Company’s common stock on the open market or in privately negotiated transactions prior to September 1, 2018. The repurchase plan represents approximately 6.7 percent of the Company’s common stock outstanding as of June 30, 2017.

Chairman, President and CEO David Payne stated, “This dividend and share repurchase program recognize Westamerica’s consistent profitability, healthy capital level, and solid asset quality.”

On July 20, 2017, Westamerica reported $15.8 million in net income for the three months ended June 30, 2017, or $0.60 diluted earnings per common share.

Westamerica Bancorporation, through its wholly owned subsidiary, Westamerica Bank, operates banking and trust offices throughout Northern and Central California.
